member.name: D3D12_DRED_ENABLEMENT

summary.para: Defines constants (used by the ) that specify how individual Device Removed Extended Data (DRED) features are enabled. As of DRED version 1.1, the default value for all settings is D3D12_DRED_ENABLEMENT_SYSTEM_CONTROLLED.

member.seealso: Use DRED to diagnose GPU faults

summary.para: Specifies that a DRED feature is enabled only when DRED is turned on by the system automatically (for example, when a user is reproducing a problem via FeedbackHub).
Specifies that a DRED feature should be force-disabled, regardless of the system state.
Specifies that a DRED feature should be force-enabled, regardless of the system state.
